articles.title: 'Don't forget he is 7-8 years older than when he could do it with ease': Ravi Shastri on MS Dhoni captaining CSK - Hindustan Times
articles.description: There is always a chance mathematically, but whether Dhoni can still do the unthinkable and take CSK to the IPL 2022 playoffs remains to be seen. Former India coach Ravi Shastri feels that MSD will leave no stone unturned in leading the side in the remainder …
articles.content: With a 13-run defeat to Royal Challengers Bangalore, Chennai Super Kings are all but eliminated from the race to the IPL 2022 playoffs. CSK needed to win all their remaining games, but a seventh defe… [+1913 chars]
